about_the_game:
Having discovered your experiments, the town of Westreach forced you to run. You've escaped to a nearby abandoned church outside of town. You'll show them the true power of your experiments on your quest for revenge!


  • Gather body parts, reanimating them into workers that will help maintain your machines or fighters that will follow you into town.
  • Collect scrap and research notes to build various machines to help strengthen and enhance yourself and your zombies.
  • Machines use body parts as fuel, doing various things such as reanimating zombies automatically, defending against nearby invaders, increasing health regeneration, and much more!
  • During the day you'll have to keep an eye on your hideout, as townsfolk will launch raids to destroy your machines!


  • Collect serum allowing you to choose many different abilities for your fighter zombies.
  • Three tiers of areas, each containing more difficult enemies.
  • Complete random events to gain research notes, which are needed to build machines.
  • The longer you're in town the more aware the townsfolk become of your location and as awareness rises more difficult enemies appear with increased drops.
  • Return to your hideout at any time to regroup as the townsfolk are normally afraid to enter the abandoned church area.
  • Slowly conquer the map, unlocking new areas to build and expand.

content_descriptors.notes: Player will dig up body parts from graves, and body parts will drop from the enemies that can be collected.

short_description: Be the horde! Create an army of zombies and wreck havoc on the town of Westreach! Enhance your zombies with experiments, allowing you to grant them abilities and mutations. Roguelike elements with minor crafting and building.
